short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: More than a Browser Protection to Secure Your Digital Life and Faster Browsing Experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a browser protection extension on Google Chrome Web Store available for free for all users. This is designed to provide users with a secure digital experience.

It is more than a browsing protection. It not only ensures a safer and faster browsing experience but also includes a gamut of security features including malicious URL scanner, email spam score, phishing detector, file scan, ad blocker, DNS lookup, website blocker and lot more to secure your digital life.
